edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class GeoAlarmDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.GeoAlarmDB

  • public class GeoAlarmDB
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Used for loading and manipulating the local SQLLite database. This database is used for storing route information, state information, etc. This class is an implementation of SQLiteOpenHelper, an Android class used to wrap SQLite database operations
    Author:
    GeoAlarm

        public void close()

      • getAroundMe

        public java.util.ArrayList<StopInfo> getAroundMe(Location loc)
        Queries the database for all bus stops, and returns an ArrayList<> containing those stops near the passed in location
        Parameters:
        loc - The Location that we want nearby stops for
        Returns:
        An ArrayList<> of the stops around loc

      • getBusLines

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBusLines()
        This method returns an ArrayList<> containing the names of the bus lines, ordered by spelling in the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList<> of the bus lines in the database

      • getLineStops

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLineStops(java.lang.String selectedLine)
        This method returns an ArrayList<> containing the stops on a particular bus line. It first queries the Routes table to get the routeID corresponding to the selectedLine. Then it queries the Route_Station table to get all the stationIDs associated with that route. Finally, it queries the Station table to get the station names.
        Parameters:
        selectedLine - The line selected by the user
        Returns:
        A list of the stations associated with a particular line

      • getRouteIDfromRouteName

        public int getRouteIDfromRouteName(java.lang.String name)
        This method queries the Routes table, and returns the routeID corresponding to the given route name
        Parameters:
        name - A string representing the name of a Route
        Returns:
        The routeID corresponding to the route

      • getStationIDsfromRouteID

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getStationIDsfromRouteID(int routeID)
        This method queries the Route_Station table, and returns the list of stations on a route
        Parameters:
        routeID - An integer routeID
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the stationIDs on the route

      • getStationNamesFromStationIDs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getStationNamesFromStationIDs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> stationIDList)
        This method queries the Station table, and returns the a list of station names corresponding to the stationIDs in the stationID list
        Parameters:
        stationIDList - A list of stationIDs
        Returns:
        A list of station names

      • getLatitude

        public double getLatitude(java.lang.String stationName)
        This method returns the latitude for a given station name
        Parameters:
        stationName - The name of a station (from the name column in the database)
        Returns:
        A double representing the latitude

        Returns:

      • setupUsageDataTable

        public void setupUsageDataTable()
        This method makes sure the table for data usage storage is setup. Specifically, it creates the table rows if they don't exist, and resets the temp rows to zero.

        Returns the list of stop times corresponding to the given station name and route name
        Parameters:
        stationName - The name of a station
        routeName - The name of a route
        Returns:
        An ArrayList<> containing the stop times sorted in ascending order
